attributes.action: Prevent parents sending their child(ren) to schools they cannot walk to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Inevitably there will have to be exceptions - such as disabled children & those in rural areas.
However, you only have to look at traffic flow during school holidays to see this is the single biggest contributor to rush hour congestion & gridlock.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
